thread.title: Device Enhances Rifle Safety - Designed by InventHelp Client (SUU-111)
thread.title_full: Device Enhances Rifle Safety - Designed by InventHelp Client (SUU-111) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Device Enhances Rifle Safety - Designed by InventHelp Client (SUU-111)
text:
InventHelp, a Pittsburgh-based inventor service firm, is submitting THE MODEL 2007 to companies for their consideration.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 10, 2015
An inventor from Beaufort, Mo., saw a need for increased precaution relating to rifles. "I wanted to provide a way to make a rifle safer, so I conceived of THE MODEL 2007," he said. He then created a prototype of his idea.
Ideal for hunters and target shooters, this device provides a way to make a rifle safer. It helps prevent accidental or unauthorized shooting, as well as promotes peace of mind. It also is faster than 73 and 92 Winchesters. The idea is patent pending.
The original design was submitted to the St. Louis office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-SUU-111, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
